q_en: What is the task with the highest planned quantity among all cutting tasks that have not been completed and have an end date before July 2024??

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Expert Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group named 'Expert Cutters'

steps.sql: ['SELECT id, MAX(planned_number) AS highest_planned_quantity FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = 4 AND status != 2 AND end_time < '2024-07-01';']
steps.description: Find the tasks with the highest planned quantity among the selected working group that have not been completed and have an end date before July 2024
